text: Ndipo iwe umawaona anthu amene ali ndi matenda m’mitima mwawo ali kuwathamangira abwenzi awo nati: “Tili kuopa kuti mwina tsoka likhoza kutigwera ife.” Mwina Mulungu akhoza kubweretsa kupambana kapena lamulo mwachifuniro chake. Ndipo iwo adzadandaula chifukwa cha zimene adasunga ngati chinsinsi mwa iwo okha
